<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="5358" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP">You</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="MD">can’t</word>
		<word type="VB">publish</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">a</word>
		<word type="NN">paper</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">on</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN">physics</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">without</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT">the</word>
			<word type="JJ">full</word>
			<word type="JJ">experimental</word>
			<word type="NN">data</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="CC">and</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NNS">results</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=":">;</word>
	</chink>
	<chink>
		<word type="WDT">that</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="MD">should</word>
		<word type="VB">be</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">the</word>
		<word type="NN">standard</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">in</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN">journalism</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=""">"</word>
	</chink>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","2"
